page.title: 06SHOPPING IN HUMBIE
page.content: IN OUR SQUARE WE HAVE ONLY ONE SHOP.IT IS A POST OFFICE AND GENERAL STORE.AS WELL AS GROCERIES YOU CAN BUY BIRTHDAY CARDS,NEWSPAPERS,EARRINGS AND STATIONERY.MOST PEOPLE USE THE POST OFFICE FOR THINGS THAT THEY HAVE RUN OUT OF.OF THE PEOPLE IN OUR SURVEY ONLY EIGHT BUY LOTS OF SHOPPING THERE.BECAUSE THERE ARE NO OTHER SHOPS VANS COME ROUND. WE ASKED PEOPLE WERE THEY DO THEIR MAIN SHOPPING. WE FOUND THAT DALKEITH WAS THE MOST POPULAR IT IS EIGHT MILES AWAY. NEXT CAME EDINBURGH TWENTY MILES AWAY AND AFTER THAT HADDINGTON TEN MILES AWAY. THOSE WHO USE THE LOCAL SHOPPING FACILITIES TEND TO BE THE ELDERLY AND THOSE WITH NO TRANSPORT.ONE HOUSEHOLD GETS A DELIVERY OF SHOPPING.
